releaseNotes:
Initial LITE release - Simplified Version:
- Fixed 1:2 Risk:Reward ratio (most popular)
- Drag direction determines which level you're setting (SL or TP)
- Simple toggle button
- Visual line preview
- Auto-disable after placement
- User-based licensing (Vendor ID: 486)

Upgrade to PRO for:
- Configurable R:R ratios
- Hotkeys
- Real-time overlay
- Multiple bracket sets
- Sound alerts
- Settings window

changes: Drag direction logic (down for SL, up for TP)

proFeatures: Real-time overlay showing SL/TP prices during drag
Multiple bracket sets for position scaling
